content.rendered:
For devices running Android 5.0+

v10.22.001

  • Added feature to export as HTML and CSV from backups
  • Keep screen awake during Transfers to reduce disconnection issues

v10.21.004

  • Fix for an issue where the app was not detecting itself as the default SMS app during the delete messages process
  • Added a label above Ads to identify them more easily so as to reduce users from mistaking them for app functionality

v10.21.003

  • Fix for disabling RCS messages backups on Samsung devices.

v10.21.002

  • Fix for OneDrive upload test not working correctly.
  • Changes to default setting for Google Drive access.

v10.21.001

  • Fix for OneDrive upload issues for some users.
  • Upgrade to Target Android 14 SDK as required by Play Store.

v10.20.002

  • Fix for MMS message parts not restoring properly on Android 14.

v10.20.001

  • Temporary fix for messages not restoring properly on Android 14. This may result in the correct sim not getting associated to messages on devices with more than 1 sim card.

v10.19.010

  • More fixes for upload issues with Dropbox and Google Drive
  • Viewer now displays date ranges for the whole backup as well as each conversation
  • Added ISO-8601 date format for readable dates

v10.19.004

  • Fix for scheduled backups failing to upload in certain cases.

v10.19.003

  • Updated to target Android 13 (SDK 33)
  • Changed the way scheduled backups work due to new Android restrictions
  • Fixed an issue with Dropbox uploads
  • Workaround for Dropbox inadvertently deleting all backups due to an API bug

v10.18.001

  • Fix for Wi-Fi detection on Android 13 devices
  • Added filtering in contact/conversation lists
  • Option to invert selection in lists

v10.17.002

  • Updated some screens to clarify action buttons
  • Fix for date range selection
  • Better error handling for OneDrive issues on older devices
  • Fix for some Dropbox upload issues

v10.16.001

  • PRO - Option to accept self-signed certificate for WebDAV
  • Better progress displayed during deletion of all calls/messages
  • More details displayed after restore completion
  • Fix SMTP server for Outlook/Hotmail
  • Fix for inadvertently logging user out of OneDrive

v10.15.004

  • Fix for local storage issues on Android 11+ devices
  • Fix for error while restoring without Media messages

v10.15.002

  • Initial support for RCS/Advanced messages for phones using Samsung Messages app
  • Updated the options for messages with media/attachments in them
  • Updated Android Target SDK to Android 11

v10.12.012

  • Fixes related to OneDrive authentication errors.

v10.12.010

  • Bug fixes related to:
    - renaming of archive mode backups
    - backup range date filters
    - Google Drive upload test

v10.12.002

  • PRO - Initial support for WebDAV (Nextcloud, ownCloud, pCloud, Box.com, NAS etc)
  • Added a screen to view app logs (Menu > Help and feedback > View app logs)
  • Rearranged settings screens

v10.11.001

  • Add print support for call logs
  • Added a menu to print from backups
  • Better handling of OneDrive errors related to network failures
  • Added info about recovering deleted messages

v10.10.001

  • New option to backup messages within a date range
  • Show count of call logs or messages while viewing backups
  • Better error messages for transfer failures
  • TLS1.2 support in emails
  • Some crash fixes

v10.09.002

  • Fix for + sign getting removed from some numbers during restore
  • Fix for a crash while manually sending files

v10.09.001

  • Upgrade Android SDK to 29
  • Remove the need for Storage permission on new installs
  • Fix display of conversations during selection
  • Improve duplicate detection during restore
  • Improve OneDrive error handling
  • Improve display of delivery receipts etc
  • Another fix for restore progress going past 100%

v10.08.006

  • fixed an issue with time selection for scheduled backups not working on some devices
  • updated translations

v10.08.004

  • Fix for potential continuous backups due to Daylight Savings changes
  • Another fix for restore progress going past 100%
  • Some other crash fixes

v10.08.003

  • More fixes related to large file uploads to OneDrive.

v10.08.002

  • Updated Dropbox SDK
  • Fix for OneDrive upload failures
  • Fix for restore progress going past 100%
  • Display access levels on Google Drive and OneDrive setup screens

v10.08.001

  • Update to latest AndroidX and Firebase libraries
  • Fix issues with app crashing on phones without Google Play Services
  • Remove Chrome requirement for OneDrive

v10.07.106

  • Fix for Restore Conversation not working on OnePlus phones
  • Added option to Restore a Conversation from Messages/Calls list

v10.07.105

  • Fix for a selected conversation related issue in Archive mode

v10.07.104

  • More prominent note about Google messages after restore
  • Better date format picker
  • Minor changes related to Dropbox old file deletion

v10.07.103

  • Add incremental backups feature
  • Add feature to split Archive mode backups
  • Add feature to restore multiple backups at once
  • Add feature to back up text-only MMS
  • Workaround for invalid messages being backed up with Google Messages

v10.06.120

  • Fix for Dropbox login crashing the app on some devices
  • Minor update to Dark Theme for Samsung devices

v10.06.110

  • Fix for restore not working on some OnePlus devices
  • Fix for uploads not working from Download folders
  • Delete screen now remembers previous selection

v10.06.102

  • Fix for restore failing on some Huawei/Honor devices
  • Better duplicate checks during restore
  • Fix for viewer crashing on some devices

v10.05.301

  • PRO - Option to compress and encrypt backup files
  • Option to disable duplicate check during restore
  • Option to disable local copy of latest cloud backup
  • Option to select access for Google Drive
  • Add privacy policy within the app

v10.05.100, 101, 102, 103

  • Add support for Microsoft OneDrive
  • Fix Tasker integration to work properly with MacroDroid
  • Other minor bug fixes

v10.04.100

  • Better cloud folder selection
  • Better cloud upload progress reporting
  • Fix for crash when sending files manually on some devices
  • Fix for scheduled backups not running reliably on some devices

v10.03.102

  • Updated the Send Log and Contact Developer screens
  • Fixed app crash when sending files from the Send File screen.

v10.03.101

  • Added banner ads, can be turned off from Settings.
  • Updated contact emails.

 

For devices running older versions of Android

v9.75.1

  • Updated the Send Log and Contact Developer screens
  • Added banner ads, can be turned off from Settings.
